title: Mr Koumal invents a robot
brief_description: Mr Koumal envisions a simple mechanical device to shine his shoes for him. But the more he works on it, the more complex it becomes, until he eventually creates a huge robot which becomes master instead of servant and forces Mr Koumal to shine its shoes.
